text: Anazama Elisa'a negeno'a kezatino amanage hu'ne, Nafanimoke, nafanimoke, kagra Israeli vahe'mokizmia hosi agumpi manine'za ha'ma nehaza vahekna hunenka karisiraminkna hu'nane. Hagi Elaija'a hago vigeno Elisa'a mago'ene onke'ne. Anante Elisa'a amegama antani'nea nakre ku'a tarefi eri tagato tagatu hu'ne.
